resources.string:
Note*: FreeSoftware = Freedom+Software 
 Freedom 0- Use the software for any purpose . 

 Freedom 1- Read the software
 	 and modify as you wish. 

 Freedom 2- Share the software 
 	 to whoever you wish.(we will not file case for this).

 Freedom 3- Share the modified software to whoever you wish with all the above FREEDOM 

			 CopyLeft
\n Open Source is the concept derived from GNU(FreeSoftware)

What is Freedom and DigitalFreedom ? 

 	 Rights to do what you wish , without affecting the society is Freedom 
 	 Rights to use/share the software you purchased however you want without affecting society is DigitalFreedom 
 
 This software has the full freedom to use and share 

*Note: Improvise the software ,if it is not good.

An alternate source for "Google-Play store" , where you can get softwares(applications) with full access permission and without advertisements 

 It has the applications under (FOSS-Free/OpenSource Software) 

 You cannot find this app in play store, coz it is a competetive to the PlayStore . 

 *Note: VLC , 2048 ,FireFox ..etc all are under (FOSS)
